thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Akorn Shares Plunge as Fresenius Investigates Company

author: Maria Armental
title: Akorn Shares Plunge as Fresenius Investigates Company
text:
German health-care company Fresenius SE & Co. said Monday it is looking into possible product development data breaches at Akorn Inc., a probe that could derail its purchase of the U.S. generic-drugs manufacturer.
Hours later, Akorn issued a statement saying that it also was looking into the matter and that “to date, the company’s investigation has not found any facts that would result in a material impact on Akorn’s operations and the company does not believe this investigation should affect the closing of the transaction...
